title: Russia: Citi Names Winners of STP Excellence Award 2010
summary: Moscow – VTB Bank, NOMOS-Bank and Center-invest Bank have been granted the prestigious Citi 2010 Quality Recognition Award for U.S. dollar payments. Bharat Sarpeshkar, Citi GTS Global Bank Services Group Head, and Srinivasan Sridhar, Citi GTS Bank Services group Head for CEEMEA Region, handed the award to VTB Bank and Nomos Bank.
tag-1: Russia: Citi Names Winners of STP Excellence Award 2010
tag-3: Moscow – VTB Bank, NOMOS-Bank and Center-invest Bank have been granted the prestigious Citi 2010 Quality Recognition Award for U.S. dollar payments. Bharat Sarpeshkar, Citi GTS Global Bank Services Group Head, and Srinivasan Sridhar, Citi GTS Bank Services group Head for CEEMEA Region, handed the award to VTB Bank and Nomos Bank.
tag-4: This award is annually given to the best-in-class banks by their main USD clearer to recognize their success in formatting foreign currency payments. Straight Through Processing (STP) means that the payments sent to the bank for clearing by its correspondents are being processed automatically without human involvement. The higher the STP rate is, the more efficient and cost effective the payment processing is. So it is beneficial for both sides – the clearer and its correspondents – because they spend less processing each transaction and can support a higher volume of payments with the same resources.
tag-5: Srinivasan Sridhar, Citi GTS Bank Services group Head for CEEMEA Region, said: "We are honored to award our partner banks with the Citi 2010 Quality Recognition Award. The banks we are recognizing today with these awards have state-of-the-art international STP electronic payment services and meet stringent correspondent banking and processing accuracy criteria. We wish you continued excellence and success in the years to come, and thank you for your relationship."
tag-6: Dmitry Aleksandrov, Deputy Head of Correspondent Banking Department at VTB Bank commented: "For many years, Citi has been a reliable partner of VTB Bank in inter-bank cooperation and transaction business. We are very pleased that Citi – one of the leading global financial institutions – highly praised the level of VTB Bank's professionalism in processing and standardizing transaction documents by presenting the STP Award 2010. We hope that such events symbolizing the level and quality of transaction cooperation between the banks will become a good tradition and will offer pleasant opportunities for meetings in the future."
tag-7: Irina Gordeeva, Deputy President of NOMOS-Bank, noted: "This prestigious award confirmed the high professional level of NOMOS-Bank's employees. We value our fruitful cooperation with Citi that has evolved over the years of collaborative work. And we look forward to growing our partnership, including by taking it into other business areas."
tag-8: "The mission of Center-invest Bank is to deliver world-class banking services to our clients. We are very pleased that the work of our specialists was recognized by Citi – one of the global leaders in international transactions. We look forward to expanding our partnership with Citi Corporation. In addition to transaction business, our banks collaborate in the fields of trade financing and financial markets transactions," commented Grigoriy Chorayan, Head of Treasury Department and Member of the Board of Center-invest.
tag-9: Citi Citi, the leading global financial services company, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Through Citicorp and Citi Holdings, Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management. Additional information may be found at www.citigroup.com.
tag-10: Global Transaction Services  Citi Global Transaction Services (GTS) provides corporations, financial institutions and public sector entities with access to Citi's full range of cash management and trade finance services, as well as securities and funds capabilities, complemented by an on-the-ground presence and in-depth knowledge of more than 100 local markets. Our range of products, technologies and market expertise gives us a unique opportunity to package our capabilities and offer effective solutions to new and existing clients. GTS aims at providing clients with tools to increase their efficiency and competitiveness in today's challenging and changing business environment.
tag-11: ZAO Citibank  ZAO Citibank, a full subsidiary of Citi in Russia, has been operating since 1993 when it became one of the first banks with foreign capital to enter the Russian market. It was the first out of three current subsidiaries of Citibank in CIS. Citibank has since grown its business to be among the country's largest banks offering a full range of products and services to corporate and consumer customers. At present, the Bank has over 3,000 employees; its distribution network includes retail branches, 400 ATMs and representative offices in largest cities in Russia, Ukraine, and Kazakhstan. The number of the bank's consumer clients has exceeded 1,000,000 Russians. www.citibank.ru
